singleton

Class CouponSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • singleton.CouponSystem

  • public class CouponSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    The CouponSystem class is a singleton that allows access to the rest of the system (by loging in and returning facade to the user), shuts down the system (closes all connections) and activates the cleaner thread (that remove all the expired coupons).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CouponSystem getInstance()
      Creates and returns the only instance of the singleton
      ClientFacade Login(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password, ClientType type)
      Login to the system.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CouponSystem getInstance()
        Creates and returns the only instance of the singleton

        instance of the singleton

      • Login

        public ClientFacade Login(java.lang.String userName,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          ClientType type)
                   throws CouponSystemException
        Login to the system. Thos method returns facade to the user by its type (administrator, company or customer), its username and its password
        Parameters:
        userName - username of the user
        password - password of the user
        type - type of the client that tries to login the system (admin/company/customer)
        Returns:
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException
